Title: Relates to automatic sealing of certain misdemeanor records
Summary: Requires automatic sealing of certain misdemeanor records; provides exceptions thereto; requires the division of criminal justice services to publish statistics on automatic sealing of certain records.
LawCode: Add ยง160.56, CP L; amd ยง837, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the executive law, in relation to automatic sealing of certain misdemeanor records
